entry.title: Pardo on Headroom podcast
entry.content: Lab director Bryan Pardo is featured on episode 7 of Headroom, a podcast dedicated to the impact of audio technology, hosted by Grammy-nominated mastering engineer Jonathan Wyner.
entry.summary: Lab director Bryan Pardo is featured on episode 7 of Headroom, a podcast dedicated to the impact of audio technology, hosted by Grammy-nominated mastering engineer Jonathan Wyner.

entry.title: Invited Talk
entry.content: On September 28, lab director Bryan Pardo will be giving an invited talk at the AES VIRTUAL SYMPOSIUM: APPLICATIONS OF MACHINE LEARNING IN AUDIO
entry.summary: On September 28, lab director Bryan Pardo will be giving an invited talk at the AES VIRTUAL SYMPOSIUM: APPLICATIONS OF MACHINE LEARNING IN AUDIO

entry.title: Lab welcomes 2 new members
entry.content: We’re happy to welcome our two newest lab members: Hugo Flores Garcia and Patrick O’Reilly! Find out more about them on the People page
entry.summary: We’re happy to welcome our two newest lab members: Hugo Flores Garcia and Patrick O’Reilly! Find out more about them on the People page
